title: Ah Lang the Fox - Novel Updates
tags: Fantasy Creatures   Female Protagonist   Fox Spirits   Modern Day   Oneshot
author: 坡西米
description:
When rain falls while the sun is shining, a fox wedding is being held.

A city girl returns to her hometown. There is such a folklore in her hometown:

Legend has it that there is a fox in the mountain. The fox has a cave full of treasures, which is reserved as betrothal gifts for his bride.

There is a tradition in the village that every time the villagers get married, the bride will sing a folk song to the fox in a wedding dress. The fox will then bless her with a happy marriage. If she sings well, the fox will also send her a betrothal gift. At night, he would walk on the dew-dusted path to marry her.>
